product_name: Talos Products K9 Sky-Trak Dog Tether Kit
long_description: The K9 Sky-Trak Dog Tether Kit from Talos Products lets you set up a portable, packable dog run in your backyard, on a camping trip or at a relative's house. Includes 50 ft. of strong nylon rope to string up between a pair of trees, posts or other anchor points; won't damage trees. For installing the rope, the kit includes a carabiner and sturdy figure-9 cleat (Talos has an instructional video on their website). 4-ft. leash attaches to the rope with a pulley and 2nd carabiner, all included; lets your dog run freely between the 2 anchor trees/posts. Talos Products K9 Sky-Trak Dog Tether Kit also comes with a carry pouch and a waterproof nylon dog bowl.
short_description: The K9 Sky-Trak Dog Tether Kit from Talos Products lets you set up a portable, packable dog run in your backyard, on a camping trip or at a relative's house.
